Timer

Runs a timer for a specified duration starting with a specified signal. It outputs the state of the timer as well as the time elapsed.

Timer

  • Turn On
  • Duration
  • Time
  • Done

Usage

Inputs

Turn On

A pulse on this port will begin timing

Duration

How long to run the timer for

Outputs

Time
Done

Sends a pulse when the timer is done
